strings.Value: "The people are complaining. They wish to see their ruler looking after their safety, rather than merely enjoying the comforts of rule."
"They shall have to steel themselves with patience. We shall protect the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}, but wars are not won overnight."
"Funny peoples. A chieftain sets an example, but if a tribe can't stand up for itself, what good is it?"
"In other words, they desire to see that {mf|he|she} is ruling to their pleasure, not {mf|his|her} own."
